cause.description:
This group is for Christian's who know Jesus is the only way and want to tell everyone about Him. :)
1. Jesus Christ is the Son of God and the Only way to heaven.
2. All other religions are false.
3. The Bible is the inerrent word of God.
cause.mission: To tell people that Jesus is the only way to heaven and all you have to do is trust Him.
cause.name: Jesus is the ONLY way!
